p: All values are expressed as mean ± SD of at least two independent experiments. Comparisons between different treatments were analysed by a one-way or two-way ANOVA tests as deemed appropriate. Values of p < 0.05 were considered statistically significant for a post-hoc Tukey′s test. All statistical tests were done using the software GraphPad Prism (version 8.01, GraphPad Software, La Jolla, CA, USA).
